message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $1200000 to us, but we are willing to consider a fair price that reflects its true value. Our initial offer is $1500000. We believe this price not only compensates us fairly for our investment but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. Let's work together to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
